name: Binary Glitch (danixoon)
description:
Binary G1itch
An arcade game about small ball "Kolobock"

P.S. Game have tutorial, btw

Controls:

  • 1. Move ball with mouse
  • 2. Jump into pair by pressing left mouse button
  • 3. Undo your jump by pressing right mouse button
  • 4. Open pause by pressing escape

Rules:

  • Stay alive, make c-c-combos and show me your maximum highscore!
